contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Volontaires |Pic=[[File:Volontaires - Entrée.JPG|275px]] |Day=5 November |Year=1910 |Access= |Municipality=the 15th arrondissement of Paris |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|12|Vaugirard|Pasteur}} | X=97 | Y=113 }} '''Volontaires''' is a [[metro station|station]] on [[Paris Métro Line 12|line 12]] of the [[Paris Métro]] in the [[15th arrondissement of Paris|15th arrondissement]]. It is located at the junction of the ''Rue des Volontaires'' with the [[Rue de Vaugirard]]. The station opened on 5 November 1910 as part of the original section of the [[Nord-Sud Company]]'s line A between [[Porte de Versailles (Paris Métro)|Porte de Versailles]] and [[Notre-Dame-de-Lorette (Paris Métro)|Notre-Dame-de-Lorette]]. On 27 March 1931 line A became line 12 of the ''Métro''. It is named after the ''Rue des Volontaires''. ==Gallery== <gallery widths="200px" heights="125px" perrow="2"> File:Volontaires-quais.jpg|[[Paris Métro Line 12|Line 12]] platforms at Volontaires File:Volontaires-SIEL.jpg|Volontaires platform signage </gallery> {{commons category|Volontaires (Paris Metro)}} ==References== *Roland, Gérard (2003). ''Stations de métro. D’Abbesses à Wagram.'' Éditions Bonneton. {{Paris Metro/line 12}} {{coord|48.841343|N|2.307504|E|region:FR_type:landmark_scale:2000_source:frwiki|display=title|format=dms}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Volontaires (Paris Metro)}} [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1910]] {{Paris-metro-stub}}
